channel.title: Battlefield Hardline
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oyster.ignimgs.com/wordpress/stg.ign.com/2014/05/new-battlefield-game-clues-spotted-in-battlelog-update-reports-140120093241.png[/img][/center]
Visceral Games, a video game development studio part of EA, and mostly known for the Dead Space trilogy, is now developing the next game in Battlefield's series: Battlefield Hardline. The game is going to be based off the war on crime and the battle between cops and criminals.
The game, along with many other details, will be announced at E3 2014.
Basically all information known so far can be found at the following link: http://getbblog.com/en/board/topic/118852/1/Codeleak-New-Battlefield-already-in-the-work-or-a-big-update-in-Battlelog
What do you guys think about this? Personally, I don't think it should be considered a Battlefield game. And seeing how rocky Battlefield 4 still is after all this time, I don't have much hope for a new Battlefield, especially one revolving around something completely different.

I am a fan of battlefield. I enjoyed battlefield 4 and I am actually looking forward to battlefield: Hardline (Considering I have pre-ordered it already) and I hope that it will be good.

item.title: Battlefield Hardline
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Everyone says the storylines suck, but I really enjoyed them all.

The next main game in the BF franchise (since I’m not considering Hardline to be a main game) will probably be Bad Company 3. The other Bad company games were relaxed and had fantastic storylines, which will hopefully be the case in the next one if they can actually release a fully working game unlike BF4.

Oh, and for anyone who cares, Battlefield 3 is free on Origin until June 3rd.

item.title: Battlefield Hardline
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Battlefield 4 was released Fall of 2013, and this is being released Fall of 2014. I’ve spent about $110 on the game (the base game + premium) and there is no way in hell I’m doing that every year. Hopefully this is just a smaller title (kinda like Battlefield Play4free), and a larger main title is still being made by EA DICE and will be released fully in a few years time, basing around actual warfare, which is what I want Battlefield to be.

The whole cop warfare thing isn’t a bad idea, but like you said, it’s a shame they are using the Battlefield title for a whole new game.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Hardline
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

They’re starting to pump them out like CoD games. Besides feeling horribly unfamiliar, BF4 doesn’t seem to have changed any besides maybe updated textures (minimal change at best) and upgraded to 64 slot servers. They still have DLC and such to give us in BF4, so I hope this game takes a few years to be created and released, as I am going to be highly pissed off if people switch over to that >.>

Sounds like they’re using the battlefield title to create a completely different game. Which is a shame, as I felt up until the abomination of BF4, it was a highly respected title.
